TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit Preferences extends System.Object
public ref class Preferences abstract sealed

Docs.summary: The Preferences API helps to store application preferences in a key/value store.

remarks.para: Each platform uses the platform provided native APIs for storing application/user preferences:
